statements: SELECT athlete_id, workout_date, weight_lifted, reps_completed, time_taken FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics WHERE athlete_id = 1 ORDER BY workout_date DESC, time_taken ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics WHERE reps_completed > 10 AND weight_lifted >= 50 ORDER BY workout_date ASC
SELECT athlete_id, SUM(weight_lifted) AS total_weight_lifted FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING total_weight_lifted > 100
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(reps_completed) AS max_reps FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY athlete_id ORDER BY max_reps DESC
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(weight_lifted) AS avg_weight_lifted FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING avg_weight_lifted < 75
SELECT athlete_id, workout_date, weight_lifted, reps_completed, time_taken FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT * FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics WHERE weight_lifted > 100 AND reps_completed >= 10;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS total_workouts FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT AVG(weight_lifted) AS avg_weight_lifted, AVG(reps_completed) AS avg_reps_completed FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT DISTINCT athlete_id, workout_date FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics ORDER BY athlete_id ASC, workout_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_metrics;
SELECT athlete_id, weight_lifted, reps_completed FROM athlete_metrics;
SELECT athlete_id, workout_time FROM athlete_metrics WHERE reps_completed > 10;
SELECT program_name, workout_description FROM workout_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM workout_programs WHERE program_id < 5;
SELECT athlete_id, weight_lifted, reps_completed FROM athlete_metrics WHERE reps_completed > 10 ORDER BY weight_lifted DESC, athlete_id ASC
SELECT * FROM athlete_metrics INNER JOIN workout_programs ON athlete_metrics.athlete_id = workout_programs.program_id WHERE weight_lifted > 100 ORDER BY workout_time ASC
SELECT athlete_id, workout_time FROM athlete_metrics WHERE workout_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY athlete_id DESC
SELECT program_name, workout_description FROM workout_programs WHERE LENGTH(workout_description) > 100 ORDER BY program_name ASC
SELECT athlete_id, SUM(weight_lifted) AS total_weight_lifted FROM athlete_metrics GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING total_weight_lifted > 500 ORDER BY total_weight_lifted DESC
SELECT * FROM AthleteMetrics;
SELECT athlete_id, weight_lifted, reps_completed FROM AthleteMetrics;
SELECT athlete_id, time_taken, weight_lifted FROM AthleteMetrics;
SELECT * FROM WorkoutHistory WHERE workout_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WorkoutTypes WHERE workout_type = 'Strength Training';
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(workout_id) AS workout_count FROM WorkoutHistory GROUP BY athlete_id
SELECT MAX(weight_lifted) AS max_weight_lifted, MIN(time_taken) AS min_time_taken FROM AthleteMetrics
SELECT * FROM AthleteMetrics WHERE weight_lifted > 100 AND reps_completed < 10 ORDER BY time_taken DESC
SELECT athlete_id, SUM(weight_lifted) AS total_weight_lifted FROM WorkoutHistory GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING total_weight_lifted > 500
SELECT workout_date, workout_type FROM WorkoutHistory JOIN WorkoutTypes ON WorkoutHistory.workout_id = WorkoutTypes.type_id
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athletes WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT workout_name, workout_date FROM workouts ORDER BY workout_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, workout_id, reps_completed FROM performance_metrics WHERE weight_lifted >= 100;
SELECT coach_name, experience_years FROM coaches WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT name, age FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_id, name, weight FROM athletes WHERE weight >= 70.5 ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT workout_name, duration_minutes FROM workouts WHERE workout_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT coach_name, experience_years FROM coaches ORDER BY experience_years DESC, coach_name;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_gender FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, workout_type, total_reps FROM WorkoutSessions WHERE total_reps > 50 ORDER BY total_reps DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, exercise_name, max_weight_lifted FROM AthleteWorkouts AS aw JOIN Exercises AS ex ON aw.exercise_id = ex.exercise_id WHERE max_weight_lifted > 100 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, total_reps, total_weight_lifted FROM Athletes JOIN WorkoutSessions ON Athletes.athlete_id = WorkoutSessions.athlete_id;

SELECT athlete_name, exercise_name, sets, reps FROM Athletes JOIN AthleteWorkouts ON Athletes.athlete_id = AthleteWorkouts.athlete_id JOIN Exercises ON AthleteWorkouts.exercise_id = Exercises.exercise_id;

SELECT athlete_name, exercise_name, max_weight_lifted, max_time_minutes FROM Athletes JOIN PersonalRecords ON Athletes.athlete_id = PersonalRecords.athlete_id JOIN Exercises ON PersonalRecords.exercise_id = Exercises.exercise_id;
